nodes.name: enroll

nodes.documentation:
@notice Deposit ether into bank, requires method is "payable"
 @return The balance of the user after the deposit is made
nodes.name: deposit

nodes.documentation:
@notice Withdraw ether from bank
 @return The balance remaining for the user
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation:
@notice Just reads balance of the account requesting, so "constant"
 @return The balance of the user
nodes.name: balance

nodes.documentation: @return The balance of the Simple Bank contract

enroll

nodes.documentation:
@notice Deposit ether into bank, requires method is "payable"
 @return The balance of the user after the deposit is made
nodes.name: deposit

nodes.documentation:
@notice Withdraw ether from bank
 @return The balance remaining for the user
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation:
@notice Just reads balance of the account requesting, so "constant"
 @return The balance of the user
nodes.name: balance

nodes.documentation: @return The balance of the Simple Bank contract
nodes.name: depositsBalance

deposit(uint256).return: The balance of the user after the deposit is made

depositsBalance().return: The balance of the Simple Bank contract

enroll().return: The balance of the user after enrolling

withdraw(uint256).return: The balance remaining for the user

balance().notice: Just reads balance of the account requesting, so "constant"

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit ether into bank, requires method is "payable"

enroll().notice: Enroll a customer with the bank,  giving the first 3 of them 10 ether as reward
